headline.print_headline: 2002 Letter On Eavesdropping Is Made Public
headline.main: 2002 Letter on Eavesdropping Is Made Public

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The Obama administration publicized a previously classified letter from the Bush administration’s secret program that allowed the National Security Agency to eavesdrop on Americans’ international communications.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration publicized a previously classified letter from the Bush administration’s secret program that allowed the National Security Agency to eavesdrop on Americans’ international communications.
